welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lage, Germany! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of this small town known for its historic buildings, picturesque landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Lage has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
